mapper.select:
select
from umc_alarm_config where enable=1 and del_flag!=1

select * from umc_alarm_config uac left join umc_alarm_template uat on uat.id=uac.template_id left join umc_alarm_config_collect uacc on uacc.config_id=uac.id where uac.template_id=#{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and uacc.collect_id=#{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
